H0.text: what does g stand for in baseball stats. Groundouts

H1.text: what does g stand for in baseball stats. Grand Slams

H2.text: what does g stand for in baseball stats. Gap Hits

H3.text: what does g stand for in baseball stats. Games

A4.text: G – Games played: number of games where the player played, in whole or in part

A5.text: GS – Grand slam: a home run with the bases loaded, resulting in four runs scoring, and four RBIs credited to the batter
